title: [Large-scale] Activity-based Learning Techniques for Theological Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theological concepts and biblical overview-level knowledge
context.additional_context: In a BYOD setting, 15-20 minute module-based learning via mobile apps with real-time feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three core doctrines of the New Testament using activity-based learning techniques
Learners can discuss and present one theological issue collaboratively with peers via a mobile platform
Learners can demonstrate the ability to apply theological concepts with a formative assessment accuracy rate of 80% or higher
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
